about_the_game:
Featuring cutting-edge movement mechanics, real-time destruction, brutal ultra-violence and an ever expanding arsenal of weapons, DEATHTRIP is meticulously designed to be the most over-the-top FPS out there. Inspired by classics such as Brutal Doom and Russian Overkill, DEATHTRIP is constantly evolving with new stages, new weapons and updates shaped by community feedback.

FEATURES

  • Stylish high octane action – Rack up style points as you annihilate your demons in a murderous dance through hell. Featuring old school Quake like movement, along with added goodies such as wall bouncing, double jumping & more.

  • Pyrotechnic's fantasy – Armed the most batshit insane rocket launcher in video gaming history, obliterate anything and anyone standing in your path. Wield a never before seen arsenal of insanity.

  • Dreamlike mystique – Enter an arena of aesthetic mayhem. Battle against and alongside an otherworldly cast of characters, each with their own vibes, stories and ulterior motives.

  • Pure insanity – From the demented to the straight up nuclear, uncover never before seen powers and abilities. Tastefully crafted to be the most brain frying endorphin rush on the market.

name: DEATHTRIP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Super optimized, you'll probably be fine
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: DEATHTRIP is a daring, stylish, high-octane FPS catered to the speedfreaks, mid-2000s weirdcore enthusiasts, hypercore fanatics and adrenaline junkies. Rack up style points as you strafe and bunnyhop through a demonic near-death experience.
